title: Immortal Heart
body:
Waking up in a new environment as a different person, Romie has to learn how to live all over again, but with Harry by her side, perhaps this curse is a blessing in disguise.​​

Wait

HARRYIt didn’t matter where I looked, it had made headlines everywhere in the upper east side of the country.Romie Harris has gone missing.It’s funny, hysterical even, that everyone is in such a…

Read more…

title: I Design Dreams Masterpost
body:
MAIN MASTERLIST

Updates

Summary: Original Character Story - Darcy Adams is a young and successful fashion designer. She develops a deep friendship with Harry Styles over the years since they met at an award show in 2015. They are often rumored to be together and they both see a possibility of a romantic relationship, but they remain friends for long years. The story focuses on fashion, friendship and Harry Styles. 

Warnings: None

Pairing: Harry Styles × Darcy Adams (OC)

Prologue

Chapter 1

Chapter 2

summary: 25 Days of Christmas:Day 14: She’s not coming.  angst - words 1k .-.-.-. His nose was frost bitten and one hundred percent numb...
caption:
25 Days of Christmas:

Day 14: She’s not coming.

angst - words 1k

.-.-.-.

His nose was frost bitten and one hundred percent numb as he sniffed deeply to fight the slight run he felt. Which he shouldn’t have done because he knew every time, he sniffed the snot just ran right back up his sinuses to sit at the back of his eyes and that was utterly disgusting. But at least if he was thinking about snot, he wasn’t thinking about how he was still here, waiting for you, in a park, snow falling and melting in his hair.

A part of him didn’t want to believe what everyone had told him. He had faith in you and he had faith in you as a couple so he came, much to his friends’ displeasure, waiting for you to show up and dismiss all his worries.

“Fuck,” he muttered beneath his breath, hands shaking around his phone.

It was midnight and he had been sat on the park bench for over two hours. Two hours was a lot of time for him to think, but he still couldn’t figure out what he had done to upset you so much, what made you hate him so much.

Pushing from the park bench he dug through his pocket to find his car keys. If you weren’t going to come to him, he was going to go to you.

The heat of his car was not enough to warm his knuckles and they ached as he knocked on your front door. His mind raced with what to tell you and he grew progressively more anxious as he heard footsteps grow closer.

He started to apologise, straight off the bat as the door opened but it wasn’t you. It was your roommate Marley he was looking, very tired and in pyjamas that were more suited to summer.

“Harry?” She questioned, rubbing at her eyes. Through the door he could see that the tv was on and a blanket on the couch. ‘The Santa Clause’ was still playing but he could tell that she had fallen asleep at some point during.

“Hey,” he said, a little confused and drunk, he had been at a Christmas party before going to the park. “YN here?”

“Yeah, in her room.” Stepping back Marley pulled the door open and gestured upstairs uncaringly as she moved back to the couch, leaving Harry to shut the door behind him and head upstairs.

When he knocked on your bedroom door, he heard you groan before he heard the soft muffle of your voice. “I’m sleeping.”  

Pulling the door open he snuck into the room as quietly as he could. He watched you turn in the bed with an annoyed sigh. He felt his chest tighten as you flicked your bedside light on, your annoyed look turning to an angry one in a second.

“What are you doing in my room?” Taking a few steps, he came in closer but you slid back on the bed until you couldn’t go any further.

“You didn’t show up, so I came to talk to you.”

“I didn’t want to see you.” You said, glaring at Harry as he sat down on the end of your bed.

“Why? What did I do? I can’t fix whatever happened if you don’t tell me.” His voice was tense as he looked at you. He had never felt this before, he didn’t know that such a scornful look could hurt his heart this much.

“You, you really don’t know?” Your voice cracked and you watched him wince with it. “You were with Camille.”

“Camille? I’ve not seen her since tour ended.”

“There was a photo Harry, dated last week so don’t even try to lie about it.”

Harry shook his head moving up the bed closer to you, eyebrows furrowing even further in confusion. “I’m not lying. I wouldn’t lie to you, never.” He wanted to add that it hurt to much having you look at him like that but decided it wasn’t the right time.

Grabbing your phone, you went through your texts with your best friend, finding the link that broke your heart. Handing him your phone you took in a shaky breath, you were past shedding tears over him.

“Lovely present for our first Christmas together.”

He was confused more then ever now as he read through the article quickly. The headline was telling enough and he was pissed at the moron who wrote it but he would have to save that for later.

“That’s an old photo, my hairs longer now, look.” Handing your phone back he watched you carefully as you surveyed the photo and then him sitting in front of you. “I wouldn’t cheat on you.”

You were quiet as you stared at your phone. The article had hurt you and it wasn’t going to be something you got over quickly. You had never loved someone like you loved Harry. He made you feel safe and comfortable and then your friend sent you this text and you looked him at in a different light. It wasn’t something you wanted to believe and in the haze of it all you couldn’t see the different hair length.  

“I’m sorry.” Harry said after a while and you hadn’t said anything. “Jeff normally keeps an eye on it all. Makes sure nothing is published or tells me when it does, must have missed this one, I’m sorry.”

Lifting his hand up he rested it on your foot closest to him, you flinched a bit but didn’t pull away from him completely. Taking a deep breath, you looked up to the roof and wiped away at the few tears. Harry slid up to sit beside you, hand wrapping around yours.

“Please come to me if something like that happens. Shit is always being said about me so tell me and I’ll clear it all up for you.” he squeezed your hand and you gave it a gentle squeeze back because you didn’t know what to say back to him but you felt better having it all cleared up and sat next to you.
caption_abstract:
25 Days of Christmas:

Day 14: She’s not coming.

angst - words 1k

.-.-.-.

His nose was frost bitten and one hundred percent numb as he sniffed deeply to fight the slight run he felt. Which he shouldn’t have done because he knew every time, he sniffed the snot just ran right back up his sinuses to sit at the back of his eyes and that was utterly disgusting. But at least if he was thinking about snot, he wasn’t thinking about how he was still here, waiting for you, in a park, snow falling and melting in his hair.

A part of him didn’t want to believe what everyone had told him. He had faith in you and he had faith in you as a couple so he came, much to his friends’ displeasure, waiting for you to show up and dismiss all his worries.

“Fuck,” he muttered beneath his breath, hands shaking around his phone.

angst - words 1k

.-.-.-.

Which he shouldn’t have done because he knew every time, he sniffed the snot just ran right back up his sinuses to sit at the back of his eyes and that was utterly disgusting. But at least if he was thinking about snot, he wasn’t thinking about how he was still here, waiting for you, in a park, snow falling and melting in his hair.

A part of him didn’t want to believe what everyone had told him. He had faith in you and he had faith in you as a couple so he came, much to his friends’ displeasure, waiting for you to show up and dismiss all his worries.

“Fuck,” he muttered beneath his breath, hands shaking around his phone.

[[MORE]]

It was midnight and he had been sat on the park bench for over two hours. Two hours was a lot of time for him to think, but he still couldn’t figure out what he had done to upset you so much, what made you hate him so much.

Pushing from the park bench he dug through his pocket to find his car keys. If you weren’t going to come to him, he was going to go to you.

The heat of his car was not enough to warm his knuckles and they ached as he knocked on your front door. His mind raced with what to tell you and he grew progressively more anxious as he heard footsteps grow closer.

He started to apologise, straight off the bat as the door opened but it wasn’t you. It was your roommate Marley he was looking, very tired and in pyjamas that were more suited to summer.

“Harry?” She questioned, rubbing at her eyes. Through the door he could see that the tv was on and a blanket on the couch. ‘The Santa Clause’ was still playing but he could tell that she had fallen asleep at some point during.

“Hey,” he said, a little confused and drunk, he had been at a Christmas party before going to the park. “YN here?”

“Yeah, in her room.” Stepping back Marley pulled the door open and gestured upstairs uncaringly as she moved back to the couch, leaving Harry to shut the door behind him and head upstairs.

When he knocked on your bedroom door, he heard you groan before he heard the soft muffle of your voice. “I’m sleeping.”  

Pulling the door open he snuck into the room as quietly as he could. He watched you turn in the bed with an annoyed sigh. He felt his chest tighten as you flicked your bedside light on, your annoyed look turning to an angry one in a second.

“What are you doing in my room?” Taking a few steps, he came in closer but you slid back on the bed until you couldn’t go any further.

“You didn’t show up, so I came to talk to you.”

“I didn’t want to see you.” You said, glaring at Harry as he sat down on the end of your bed.

“Why? What did I do? I can’t fix whatever happened if you don’t tell me.” His voice was tense as he looked at you. He had never felt this before, he didn’t know that such a scornful look could hurt his heart this much.

“You, you really don’t know?” Your voice cracked and you watched him wince with it. “You were with Camille.”

“Camille? I’ve not seen her since tour ended.”

“There was a photo Harry, dated last week so don’t even try to lie about it.”

Harry shook his head moving up the bed closer to you, eyebrows furrowing even further in confusion. “I’m not lying. I wouldn’t lie to you, never.” He wanted to add that it hurt to much having you look at him like that but decided it wasn’t the right time.

Grabbing your phone, you went through your texts with your best friend, finding the link that broke your heart. Handing him your phone you took in a shaky breath, you were past shedding tears over him.

“Lovely present for our first Christmas together.”

He was confused more then ever now as he read through the article quickly. The headline was telling enough and he was pissed at the moron who wrote it but he would have to save that for later.

“That’s an old photo, my hairs longer now, look.” Handing your phone back he watched you carefully as you surveyed the photo and then him sitting in front of you. “I wouldn’t cheat on you.”

You were quiet as you stared at your phone. The article had hurt you and it wasn’t going to be something you got over quickly. You had never loved someone like you loved Harry. He made you feel safe and comfortable and then your friend sent you this text and you looked him at in a different light. It wasn’t something you wanted to believe and in the haze of it all you couldn’t see the different hair length.  

“I’m sorry.” Harry said after a while and you hadn’t said anything. “Jeff normally keeps an eye on it all. Makes sure nothing is published or tells me when it does, must have missed this one, I’m sorry.”

Lifting his hand up he rested it on your foot closest to him, you flinched a bit but didn’t pull away from him completely. Taking a deep breath, you looked up to the roof and wiped away at the few tears. Harry slid up to sit beside you, hand wrapping around yours.

“Please come to me if something like that happens. Shit is always being said about me so tell me and I’ll clear it all up for you.” he squeezed your hand and you gave it a gentle squeeze back because you didn’t know what to say back to him but you felt better having it all cleared up and sat next to you.

body:

The first time Regulus Black laid eyes on Juniper Keatz, he was smitten. He was ten-years-old, sitting in the living room of Black manor, trying to read a book but staying distracted by his older…

question: COCKWARMING CONCEPTS GET ME
answer:
cockwarming could be either harry’s punishment or reward for his lovie!! when you’re too sleepy but you still want him, he’d fill you up and would only wake you good morning when he feels that you’ve had a good sleep and he wants you to have a good wake-up call!!

when he knows to himself that he looks rather delectable with what he’s wearing and he sees you physically restrain yourself from teasing him, he’d reward you with hefty rounds of mind-blowing sex, more than the tons of aftercare he gives, and cockwarming!!

but when he feels like you’re being too needy and greedy and bratty for him, to the point you don’t even listen to him — he’d punish you with his cock just buried to the hilt of your heat, not moving and completely stationary that makes you whine because there’s a burn and a stretch yet there’s no relief nor movement at all, your pleads and whines falling on deaf ears.

if he’s feeling particularly bossy and angry to how you’re acting and pleading from him, he’d remove himself completely, turning away from you in the bed with a warning growl as he clasps your hand that’s dangerously close to his prick.

“don’t make me cuff y’to the bed.”

summary: Ink My Skin With Your Name | hs
title: Ink My Skin With Your Name | hs
body:
Summery: just a little blurb. Harry comes home with a dinosaur and the title of your favourite Beatles song tattooed on him.

Requested? no

Word count: 550 or something. 

Warnings: fluff

A/N: based from this ask i sent to @isitstraightvodka whilst on anon, hahah. whipped this up real quick.

It’s half past four when Harry finally returns home to your flat by the ocean. He left sometime early in the morning, you weren’t even awake. But he left a note on the kitchen bench, “Gone to get a tattoo. Back late. Love, h xxxx”. By late, you thought he would’ve meant two maybe three in the afternoon. The Indian take out you picked up for dinner sits on the bench, waiting to be warmed up.

When the door to your flat finally opens, Harry announces himself with a “‘Ello lovie, ‘m home!”

You pause the tv, which was streaming Wonder Woman, and walk into the kitchen where Harry has poured himself a glass of orange juice. Black Plastic covers his bicep which was bare this morning, proof he actually did get a new tattoo.

“Hey babe,” You greet, planting a sweet kiss on his unshaven cheek.

“Hiya,” He says, returning the kiss, face and lips cold from the weather outside.

You roll the sleeve of his t shirt up, “C’mon then love, lets see it.”

“Oi,” He says, laughing, dimples starting to appear. “Not yet, lovie. It needs ta settle.”

You let out a small huff and pop your Indian in the microwave. Indian takeout had quickly become a tradition between you and Harry on Sunday nights.

“Got me buttered chicken, love?” Harry asks, even though he doesn’t need to. Harry knows you know his favourite is buttered chicken. You always order buttered chicken if he isn’t home to order for himself.

“Yep.” You say, making your way back to the couch, pressing play on Wonder Woman.

Harry takes up his usual spot next to you, Orange Juice on the table. “Wonder Woman, again?” He saids, grinning at you. “Haven’t we seen this like, ten times?”

You nod, swallowing a mouthful of rice. “Yeah, but I love it, so…”

-

It’s nine at night when Harry’s ready to reveal his tattoo. Your sitting in bed, laptop sitting on your tummy, propped up against your thighs. You’re working on a little project, a novel you’ve been working on when you’re not at work or out. It started at something to fill the time when you were on tour with Harry but you figure you quite like it.

“Can you rub some gel on it, babe?” Harry asks, handing you a tube of tattoo balm.

“Yeah.” You answer, saving your word document, before closing your laptop and setting it aside.

You watch as he slowly peels away the combo of tape and glad wrap around his arm. He peels back the black plastic to reveal a Sauropod tattooed on his arm. Your favourite Dinosaur.

You gasp, hands coming up to cover your mouth, “Harry! You didn’t!!”

“I did.” He sounds so smug. But really, he’s idiot. Harry’s an idiot and he’s sitting there, proud as punch, with a huge dinosaur on his arm. Underneath the dinosaur, the title of your favourite beatles song “Let It Be” is inscribed into his skin in your handwriting.”

“Why?” You ask, eyes trailing over his face.

“Because I’m in love with you. Got somethin’ for everything else I love except you.”

You’re crying now. Harry’s really an idiot and you tell him just as much. “It’s so big!”

“You’re the biggest part of my life, only seemed right.”
